remarks: A condition implying existence of an atom with the properties shown. Lemma 3.2.20 of [PtakPulmannova] p. 68.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
atcvat3.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
atcvat4i $p |- ( ( B e. HAtoms /\ C e. HAtoms ) -> ( ( A =/= 0H /\ B C_ ( A vH C ) ) -> E. x e. HAtoms ( x C_ A /\ B C_ ( C vH x ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
